meanings.definition: A small biting fly found in sandy areas.
meanings.sent1: The sandfly buzzed around the beach, looking for its next meal.
meanings.sent2: I got bitten by a sandfly while relaxing on the sandy shore.
meanings.sent3: The sandfly decided to have a feast on my legs at the beach!
meanings.sent4: The tiny sandfly was a fierce predator in the world of insects.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the sandfly's painful bite when you're near the sand!

meanings.definition: To be annoyed or bothered by sandflies.
meanings.sent1: I can't enjoy the picnic because I always sandfly around me.
meanings.sent2: She started to sandfly after spending too much time at the lake.
meanings.sent3: Don't sandfly me with your constant questions!
meanings.sent4: The memories of that annoying sandfly still sandfly in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The buzzing sound of the sandfly seemed to sandfly in my ears forever.
